channel.title: Reality Tv on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Solved
item.description: [big]More than 30 years ago, onetime Eliot Ness stand-in Robert Stack found a way to embellish his legacy in the modern era.[/big] The solution was through a show named Unsolved Mysteries, one of the first reality-based shows of the modern era, mixing scripted plots with true stories. First appearing as a special in 1987, it became a full-fledged series not long after the success of a similar program, Americaâ€™s Most Wanted on Fox.
